metadata.title: CVE-2019-16943 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A Polymorphic Typing issue was discovered in FasterXML jackson-databind2.0.0 through 2.9.10. When Default Typing is enabled (either globally orfor a specific property) for an externally exposed JSON endpoint and theservice has the p6spy (3.8.6) jar in the classpath, and an attacker canfind an RMI service endpoint to access, it is possible to make the serviceexecute a malicious payload. This issue exists because ofcom.p6spy.engine.spy.P6DataSource mishandling.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
